text: Adolfo Pajares Compostizo (26 March 1937 - 13 May 2020) was a Spanish politician and businessman. He was born in Torrelavega, Spain. He was a member of the People's Party. Pajares was President of the Parliament of Cantabria from 1990 to 1999. Pajares died on 13 May 2020 in Santander, Spain at the age of 83.Fallece Adolfo Pajares, presidente del Parlamento de Cantabria una d√©cada ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish businesspeople
